resources.string: When allocating goods, remember to give more credits to goods you value more! Currently, our algorithm meets fairness requirements for an unlimited number of agents and goods.

When allocating chores, remember to give fewer credits to chores you find easier and are more willing to do! Currently, our algorithm guarantees fairness for up to 3 agents with an unlimited number of chores. While we still provide allocations for greater than 3 agents, certain fairness requirements will not be met.
